1579810.name: RPG Maker MZ - Fantasy Music Pack Vol 1
1579810.description:
"RPG Maker MV", "RPG Maker MZ" bundled sound, North Sound that worked on SE etc.
One pack of gems to send to all RPG Maker users!
With this pack, you can cover the music from the opening to the ending of the game that you are developing!

*******************************************

BGM:
Battle music: 6 files
Castle music：1 files
Dungeon music：3 files
Field music：3 files
Theme music：4 files
Toen music：3 files
Vehicle music：2 files
Singing music：2 files

ME：21 files

45 files in total
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
